content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide assembly instructions using the available blocks from the dictionary.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure consists of 6 main components
- It has multiple layers with a chimney-like design
- Two vertical orange cylindrical pillars
- One orange triangular roof piece on top
- One red arch piece in the middle
- Two yellow supporting pieces (one horizontal beam and one curved top piece)

Block Selection and Assembly Order:
The structure can be built from bottom up using these specific blocks:

{
Step1: Move block with index 8 (right orange cylinder pillar)
Step2: Move block with index 8 (left orange cylinder pillar)
Step3: Move block with index 7 (yellow horizontal support beam)
Step4: Move block with index 1 (red arch piece)
Step5: Move block with index 9 (yellow curved top piece)
Step6: Move block with index 14 (orange triangular roof piece)
}

Note on the assembly:
- The two orange cylinders (index 8) form the vertical supports
- The yellow beam (index 7) connects the two pillars
- The red arch piece (index 1) sits on top of the yellow beam
- The yellow curved piece (index 9) caps the arch
- The orange triangular roof piece (index 14) tops the left pillar

This sequence will recreate the target structure exactly as shown in the main image, using the blocks in their correct orientations as provided in the dictionary.
